mapper.insert: insert into jm_lottery_result (id, open_id, lottery_code, lottery_name, fill_date, status) values ( uuid(), #{openId}, #{lotteryCode}, #{lotteryName}, sysdate(), "未领取" )
mapper.select: select case when count(id) > 0 then 0 else 1 end from jm_lottery_result where open_id = #{openId} and date_format(fill_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(), '%Y-%m-%d')

select id, open_id, lottery_code, lottery_name, fill_date, status, date_format(fill_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') case when date_format(fill_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(), '%Y-%m-%d') and status != '未领取' then '1' else '0' end as checkStatus from jm_lottery_result where open_id = #{openId} -- date_format(fill_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(date_add(sysdate(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') order by fill_date desc limit 7
